Rare but useful R functions Preface

Rare but useful R functions Lingyun Zhang 2021-03-21 Preface This is a book written for myself. Having said that, the meanings of “rare” and “useful” in the book title are totally decided/interpreted by one person, i.e. me–that is great freedom to me! Actually, I pick up the functions in a random manner. Often, when I read other people’s R code, if I see a function which is “rare and useful”, then I will include it in this book. Good fun, isn’t it? This book contains five sections: 1. For creating data; 2. For processing data; 3. For logical checking; 4. For plotting; and 5. For other purposes.
